name: Dune Reborn
description:
This is my version of Dune The battle for Arrakis from Sega Mega Drive

- 15 unique units; 
- 13 unique structures; 
- technology tree; 
- different sides/factions (the Houses), each with unique unit-types and super weapons; 
- classic UI optimized for mobile devices; 
- no limit of units and structures;
